662:1: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
662:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! aparamapi tvadīyapaṭavidhānaṃ sādhanaupayikaṃ sarvakarmārthasādhakam |
662:3: etenaiva tu ekākṣareṇa hṛdayamantreṇa ṣaḍākṣareṇa vāmakarāntena tvadīyena mūlamantreṇa vā ṣaḍakṣarahṛdayena omkārādyena ekākṣareṇa vā paṭasyāgrataḥ asyaiva kalpaṃ bhavati |
662:4: paścime kāle paścime samaye mayi tathāgate parinirvṛte śūnye buddhakṣetre yugādhame prāpte atrāṇe loke aśaraṇe aparāyaṇe idameva kalparājā trāṇabhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati |
662:7: ādau tāvat pūrvamevānāhate paṭe keśāpagate saptahastāyate tṛhastapṛthake sadaśe kuṅkumacandanarasaparyuṣite buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ likhayet |
662:9: dakṣiṇe pārśve sudhanaṃ subhūmiṃ āryākṣayamatiṃ mañjuśriyaṃ ca bhagavato namaskāraṃ kurvantaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṅgaṃ vāmapārśve samantabhadraṃ āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bhadrapālaṃ suśobhanaṃ ca lekhayet |
662:14: upariṣṭācca vidyādharakumārau mālādhāriṇau meghāśca varṣamāṇāḥ savidyutā lekhayitavyāḥ |
662:15: sarve ca bodhisattvā puṣpamāṇā yo bhagavato mukhaṃ vyavalokayantaḥ kartavyāḥ |
662:17: tamīdṛśaṃ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye sthāpya paścānmukhamakṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
662:18: asya mañjuśriyaḥ kāṣṭhamaunī triḥkālasnāyī tṛcelaparivarttī satatapoṣadhikaḥ śākayāvakayathābhaikṣabhaikṣāhāraścaturbhāgamannaṃ kṛtvā ratnatrayasya bhāgamekaṃ anyaḥ mañjuśriyaḥ anyat sarvasattvānāṃ śeṣamātmano payuñjīta |
662:19: akṣāntakāyo manasi bhagavantaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānālambanena manasā nātmārthamahaṃ kiñcit karomi kariṣyāmyanyatra sarvasattvānāmarthāyeti dhyātvā jāpaṃ kuryāt |
662:20: snānaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ pradīpāṃśca dadyāt |
662:21: snāpanaṃ paṭacchāyāyāḥ gandhānadhastāt puṣpāṇi ca baliṃ ca satataṃ dadyāt |
662:23: ratnatrayasya paścānmaitreyasya tadanantaramavalokiteśvarasya āryasamantabhadrasya āryākāśagarbhasya āryākṣayamateḥ kumārabhūtasya candraprabhasya sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaḥ āryavajradharasya āryatārāyāḥ āryamahāmāyūryā āryaparājitāyāḥ bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāśca gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ ca sarvameteṣāṃ pūrvaṃ datvā paścāt paṭasya dadyāt ||
662:24: paścād bahirekasmiṃ pradeśe sarvoṣṭragardabhaśvahastirūpāṇi vināyakāni valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā teṣāṃ cāśeṣaṃ dadyāt |
662:36: japakāle bhagavato'tha mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya mukhamavalokya jāpaṃ kuryāt |
662:39: anena vidhinā pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā paṭaṃ kvacit svasthe sthāne sthāpya karma kuryāt |
662:42: paścād bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ śvetacandanamayaṃ padmāsanasthaṃ bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ ekahaste dadhānaṃ dakṣiṇena phalaṃ dadhānaṃ kārayet |
662:43: tamekasmiṃ śucau pradeśe paścānmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā tasyāgrato'gnikuṇḍaṃ kuryāt |
662:44: sarvakarma sacaturasraṃ dvivitastipramāṇaṃ adhaśca gandhāṃ sarvadhānyāni ca kṣipet |
662:46: anena vidhinā navamagnimutpādya aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ athavāśokasya vā ghṛtatandulodanaṃ kṣīradadhi madhu ca sarvamupahṛtya tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā aṣṭasahasraṃ parijapya pūrṇāhutiṃ dadyāt |
662:47: paścādanyasmiṃ dine śuklapratipadamārabhya karma kuryāt aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya vigatadhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā agnimāvāhayet |
662:48: “āgaccha haripiṅgala ! dīptajihva ! lohitākṣa ! haripiṅgala ! dehi dadāpaya svāhā ||”
662:51: “āgacchagaccha kumārabhūta ! sarvasattvārthamudyato'haṃ sāhāyyaṃ me kalpaya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca pratigṛhṇa svāhā ||”
662:53: āgatasya cārgho deyaḥ sugandhapuṣpapānīyena paścāddhomaṃ kuryāt |
662:55: evaṃ saptadivasāni ghṛtatandulāni tilayāvakena cāpyāyanaṃ kuryāt ||
662:81: jātīkusumānāṃ jale ekaikaṃ puṣpaṃ gṛhītvā juhuyāt |
662:82: avaśeṣaṃ khaṇḍaṃ yasya ghrāṇāya dīyate sa ghrāṇamātreṇa vaśyo bhavati |
662:83: kuṅkuma kastūrikālavaṅgapuṣpaṃ ca mukhe prakṣipya japet |
662:84: yena saha mantrayate sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:85: marīcamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya kruddho'pi vacanena priyo bhavati |
662:90: mahati pratyūṣe'bhyutthāya jātīkusumasahitaṃ pānīyaṃ śucau pradeśe bhūmau juhuyāt |
662:95: parasya kruddhasyāpi maitrīṃ bhāvayittvā anusmṛtya mukhaṃ vyavalokayet |
662:97: sarvasugandhapuṣpaiḥ homaṃ kuryād yamuddiśya karoti sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:101: puṣpāṇyabhimantrya yasya dadāti sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:105: vīrakrayakrītāṃ guggulusarjarasaṃ gandharasaṃ śrīvāsakaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
662:106: pañcamyāṃ pañcamyāṃ ṣaṇmāsam pūrṇe sahasraguṇaṃ labhate |
662:107: sarvagandhaiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā tīkṣṇaśastreṇaikadhāreṇa cchitvā cchitvā juhuyāt |
662:108: dakṣiṇena pādā puruṣasya vāmapādaṃ striyaḥ yamicchati sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:111: arkakāṣṭhairdhānyaṃ śirīṣapuṣpairaśvāṃ aśokapuṣpaiḥ suvarṇaṃ vyādhighātakapuṣpairvastrāṇi labhate |
662:112: yad yadicchati tat sarvaṃ jātīkusumahomena karoti |
662:115: saptajaptaṃ bhājanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāmaṭati bhikṣāmakṣayāṃ labhate |
662:116: rātryāmutthāya parijapyātmānaṃ svayaṃ śobhanāni svapnāni paśyati ||
662:117: atha rājānaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ tasya pādapāṃsuṃ gṛhītvā sarṣapaistailaiśca miśrayitvā juhuyāt |
662:119: rājñīṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ sauvarcalāṃ śatapuṣpāṃ vārāhīṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
662:121: rājamātyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ bhallātakānāṃ tilāṃ vacāṃ ca pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
662:123: purohitaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ brahmadaṇḍīṃ śatapuṣpāṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
662:134: sarvānekataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt sarve vaśyā bhavanti ||
662:135: catuḥpathe ekaśūnye gṛhe vā baliṃ nivedya yo'sya glānaḥ sa tasmād vinirmukto bhavati ||
662:138: sarvarogebhyaḥ mūśrakaṃ badhvā śikhā bandhaṃ kṛtvā svaptavyaṃ |
662:146: pūrvoktena vidhānena anāhate paṭe keśāpagate āryamañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ ābhilekhyaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ |
662:158: yatpramāṇānāṃ padmānāṃ rāśiṃ juhoti tatpramāṇānāṃ dīnārāṇā rāśī labhate |
662:159: yāvad yāvat tāvajjapyamānāṃ na gṛhṇāti tāvad vidyādharacakravartī bhavati |
662:179: anenaiva vidhinā puṣpāṇāṃ sugandhānāṃ lakṣaṃ pādamūle nivedayet |
662:185: hastiskandhe mañjuśriyamagrato balasya dattvā darśanamātreṇaiva parabalasya bhaṅgo bhavati |
662:191: pradīpānāṃ sahasraṃ dattvā ekapradīpaṃ padmasūtravarttiṃ kṛtvā madhuyaṣṭiṃ veṣṭayitvā prajvālya paśyed yathābhūtaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ paśyati ||
662:193: sauvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vā kumāraṃ kṛtvā varadaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā |
662:194: vāmena bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadhānaṃ tamīdṛśaṃ sadhātukakaraṇḍakaṃ purataḥ sthāpyākṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
662:199: pūrvoktena vidhānenāvāhanavisarjanaṃ padmamudrāṃ badhvā jāpaṃ kuryāt |
662:200: dhvajamudrāyā āvarttanaṃ svastikamudrayā āsanaṃ pūrṇamudrāyārghaṃ ekaliṅgamudrāyāṃ puṣpāṇi manorathamudrāyāṃ pradīpaṃ yamalamudrāyā dhūpaṃ mayūrāsanamudrāyā gandhaṃ yaṣṭimudrāyā baliṃ anena vidhānena rātrau dinedine kuryād yāvajjāpaparisamāptiriti |
662:204: rātrau jātikusumaughaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svapet |
662:205: bhagavantaṃ paśyati dharma deśayamānaṃ bodhisattvaparivṛtaṃ yamuddiśya karoti tadeva kama kuryāt |
662:207: upoṣadhikena śuklapratipadamārabhya śrīvāsakadhūpaṃ madhumiśraṃ juhuyāt rājyaṃ labhate |
662:208: koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ svayameva paśyati dharmadeśanāṃ ca karoti |
662:209: yadi kenacit sahollāpayati sammukhamavabhāṣate avaivarttikaśca bodhisattvo bhavati ||
662:211: raktacandanamayaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ ekena pārśvena priyaṃkaraṃ anyena vīramatī sāśokavṛkṣāśrayāṃ kārayet |
662:212: tamekapārśve sthāpayitvā lavaṇasarvaparājikāvyāmiśreṇa raktacandanapratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā cchitvā cchitvā juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:213: udumbaraphalāni yasya nāmnā juhuyāt sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:214: kākodumbarikāphalāni juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:215: śṛṅgāṭakaṃ juhuyāt brāhmaṇavaśīkaraṇe padmamūlāni kṣatriyavaśīkaraṇe kaśerukāṇi juhuyāt |
662:218: trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:219: nimbapatrāṇi kaṭutailāktāni juhuyāt āhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati |
662:226: brāhmīrasaghṛtasahitaṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā tāvajjaped yāvad daśasahasrāṇi paścāt pibet sarvavādino vijayate |
662:227: yasya kruddhasyāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā loṣṭaṃ kṣipet purataḥ sa krodhaṃ muñcati ||
662:229: anāhate paṭe keśāpagate upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ āryamañjuśriyaścitrāpayitavyaḥ |
662:230: padmāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ darkṣiṇapārśve āryamahāmekhalā vāmapārśve cāryaprajñāpāramitā jāpavatī sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā śuklavastranivasanā |
662:232: bahuvidhapuṣpasaṅkīrṇaḥ nāgarājānau akāyavinirgatau padmadaṇḍadhṛtahastau āryāparājitā caikasmiṃ vighnavināyakāṃ nāśayantī agnijvālāmukhī bhṛkuṭīkṛtalocanāṃ anyasmiṃ pārśve āryaparṇaśabarī pāśaparaśuvyagrahastā kṛṣṇaraktanetrā mayūrapṛṣṭhabhirūḍhā sādhakaṃ parirakṣantī |
662:233: sādhakaśca padmamālāvyagrahastaḥ bhagavato mañjuśriyamukhaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ upariṣṭāccāmarapuṣpamālādundubhidhāriṇau devaputrau lekhayitavyau ||
662:234: taṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ sthāpya sadhātuke caitye koṭiṃ japet |
662:235: japānte ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvā daśasahasrāṇi japet |
662:244: tasyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goghṛtaṃ gṛhya tāmrabhājane sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati |
662:249: āmaśarāvasampuṭe sthāpya vacāṃ jātīkusumairveṣṭayitvā tāvajjaped yāvadaṅkurībhavati |
662:251: anyāṃ koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ sākṣāt paśyati |
662:254: sauvarṇapadmaṃ śatapatraṃ kārayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalatīti |
662:255: tena gṛhītamātreṇa vidyādharāṇāṃ cakravartī bhavati parairadharṣaṇīyaḥ |
662:256: manaḥśilāṃ haritālamañjanaṃ vā śrīparṇīsamudgake prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvat khuṭkhuṭāśabdaṃ karoti|
662:258: khaḍgaṃ gṛhya sallakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇaṃ avraṇaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadahiriva phaṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhati |
662:260: manaḥśilāṃ tṛlohapariveṣṭitāṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyatīti |
662:264: śamīvṛkṣarūḍhasyāśvatthasya sāraṃ gṛhya tṛlohapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyati |
662:266: rajataṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā asuravivarasyāgrataḥ tāvajjaped yāvaccakraṃ asurajantrāṇi bhittvā praviśati |
662:269: lohamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃ vivaradvāre jāpaṃ karoti tatra sarvayantrāṇi sphuṭanti |
662:274: śvetārkamayaṃ aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kārayitvā arkapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
662:276: śvetakaravīramūlamayaṃ kṛtvā aṅguṣṭhamātrameva tatpuṣpāṇāmekāṃ koṭiṃ nivedayet mantrī bhavati |
662:277: karahāṭavṛkṣamayaṃ vitastipramāṇamātraṃ kārayitvā tatpuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
662:279: śvetacandanamayaṃ vitastipramāṇamātraṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā jātīkusumānāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
662:281: aśvatthavṛkṣamayaṃ aṅgulamātrapramāṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kārayitvā akākolīne pānīyakumbhaṃ nivedayet |
662:284: satattasamitamagarusamidhānāṃ juhuyāt mantrī bahujanasya sammato bhavati |
662:291: yamuddiśya karmakaro tatrasthaṃ saptabhirdivasaiḥ grāmāntarasthaṃ ekaviṃśatibhirdivasaiḥ viṣayāntarasthaṃ caturbhiḥ māsaiḥ nadyantaritaṃ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ svakulavidhānenānyamantravidhānena cāśeṣaṃ karmaṃ karoti varjayitvā kāmopasaṃhitam |
662:299: mamaitat kathitaṃ kalpaṃ tasmiṃ kāle sudāruṇe ||
662:308: etat karmasya māhātmyaṃ sādhakānāṃ tu jāpinām |
662:311: amoghaṃ darśayet siddhiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame ||
